content: my first cable scarf this pattern is available in danish and english materials knit by moltrup pure merino 50g/175m held together with knit by moltrup kid silk 25g/210m you will need one skein in each yarn quality knit with one strand of each quality held together you can also use pure merino alone or substitute the silk mohair with e g filcolana saga or isager alpaca yarn alternative filcolana pernilla 50g/175m held together with filcolana tilia 25g/210m you will need one skein of each green scarf - knit by moltrup pure merino color matcha held together with knit by moltrup kid silk color chartreuse yellow and pink scarf - filcolana pernilla held together with filcolana tilia red scarf - knit by moltrup pure merino held together with filcolana saga suggested needles 4 5 mm us 7 + 4 5 mm us 7 cable needle or a double-pointed needle measurements length 96 cm 37 75 inches width 8 5 cm 3 34 inches
